___name.description: The name of the OpenShift managed cluster resource.

Properties of the OpenShift managed cluster.

___openShiftVersion.description: Version of OpenShift specified when creating the cluster.

___fqdn.description: User-specified FQDN for OpenShift API server loadbalancer internal hostname.

___authProfile.description: Defines all possible authentication profiles for the OpenShift cluster.

___publicHostname.description: Optional user-specified FQDN for OpenShift API server.

___masterPoolProfile.description: OpenShiftManagedClusterMaterPoolProfile contains configuration for OpenShift master VMs.

___properties.description: Properties of the OpenShift managed cluster.

$eref.description: Defines the Identity provider for MS AAD.

___tenantId.description: The tenantId associated with the provider.

___clientId.description: The clientId password associated with the provider.

___customerAdminGroupId.description: The groupId to be granted cluster admin role.

___secret.description: The secret password associated with the provider.

___peerVnetId.description: CIDR of the Vnet to peer.

_88OpenShiftManagedClusterMasterPoolProf.description: OpenShiftManagedClusterMaterPoolProfile contains configuration for OpenShift master VMs.

___count.description: Number of masters (VMs) to host docker containers. The default value is 3.
